el:protected.el:luamain: -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- normal = cell{floor="fl-brick"} stone = cell{stone="st-marble"} marble = cell{actor={"ac-whiteball-small", {player=0, mouseforce=1}}} -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- create_world(20, 13) draw_border_func(abyss) fill_world_func(normal, 0,1,0,-2) draw_border_func(stone, 0,1,0,-2) draw_func_corners(hollow, 2,3,-4,-6) draw_func_corners(stone, 4,3,-8,-6) draw_func_corners(stone, 7,5,-14,-10) draw_func_corners(marble, 8,5,-16,-10) draw_func(stone, {{7,4},{7,-4}}, {1,0}, 6) draw_func(stone, {{5,5},{-5,5}}, {0,1}, 3) stone({{2,6},{-2,6}})
